Deep Dungeon.name: Deep Dungeon
Deep Dungeon.original_desc:
Madō Senki is set in the town of Dorl. One day, monsters raided the town, stealing both the treasures and Princess Etna's soul. Despite the attempts of brave warriors to retrieve her soul, none have been successful.

In the dungeon, the player is given a command list. The player can choose to attack if an enemy is in the vicinity, view allocated items, escape from battle, examine the area for items, and talk if there are people nearby. The character's effectiveness in battle is largely determined by numerical values for attacking power (AP), defensive power (AC), and health (HP). These values are determined by the character's experience level (LEVEL), which raises after the character's accumulated experience (EX) reaches a certain point.
Deep Dungeon.desc:
《魔道戰記》以多爾鎮為背景。有一天，怪物襲擊了小鎮，偷走了寶藏和埃特納公主的靈魂。儘管勇敢的戰士們嘗試找回她的靈魂，但都沒有成功。

在地牢中，玩家會收到一份命令列表。玩家可以選擇在附近有敵人時進行攻擊、查看分配的物品、逃離戰鬥、檢查該區域是否有物品以及附近有人時進行交談。角色在戰鬥中的效率很大程度上取決於攻擊力（AP）、防禦力（AC）和生命值（HP）的數值。這些值由角色的經驗等級（LEVEL）決定，當角色積累的經驗（EX）達到一定程度後，經驗等級就會提高。

Game of Life.name: Game Of Life
Game of Life.original_desc: A recreation of Conway's The Game Of Life. Press one of the buttons to regenerate the algorithm again. Can be quite CPU intensive depending on the system and environment you run Lutro on and/or whether or not LuaJIT is available.
Game of Life.desc: 康威的《生命遊戲》的再現。按其中一個按鈕可再次重新生成算法。可能會佔用大量 CPU 資源，具體取決於運行 Lutro 的系統和環境和/或 LuaJIT 是否可用。

In Your Face City Trains.name: In Your Face City Trains
In Your Face City Trains.original_desc:
IYFCT is a simple but fun one-button-game similar to Canabalt.

The goal of the game is to survive as long as you can. Jump over trains with closed doors and try (as much as possible) to run through trains with open doors to avoid birds and tunnels. Some open trains will give you coffee. When your coffee-meter is full, you have one extra life.
In Your Face City Trains.desc:
IYFCT 是一款簡單但有趣的單鍵遊戲，類似於 Canabalt。

遊戲的目標是盡可能長時間地生存。跳過門關著的火車，並嘗試（盡可能）穿過門開著的火車，以避免鳥類和隧道。一些開放式火車會給你提供咖啡。當你的咖啡表滿了，你就多了一條命。

Platformer.name: Platformer
Platformer.original_desc: One of kivutar's first proof of concept demos showing off Lutro. It's a scrolling 2D platform game with no real game mechanics beyond jumping.
Platformer.desc: kivutar 的第一個概念驗證演示之一展示了 Lutro。這是一款滾動 2D 平台遊戲，除了跳躍之外沒有真正的遊戲機制。

Pong.name: Pong
Pong.original_desc: A recreation of the game Pong for Lutro.
Pong.desc: Lutro 的 Pong 遊戲的重現。

Sienna.name: Sienna
Sienna.original_desc: This is a Love2D-based endless runner game that has been ported to Lutro.
Sienna.desc: 這是一款基於Love2D的無盡跑酷遊戲，已移植到Lutro。

Snake.name: Snake
Snake.original_desc: A recreation of the Snake game for Lutro.
Snake.desc: Lutro 的貪吃蛇遊戲的重現。

Spaceship.name: Spaceship
Spaceship.original_desc: Another 2D platformer showcase example for Lutro, this time illustrating how a Metroidvania-style game could work as a Lutro game. It has several screens which were implemented and some game mechanics including combat, item collecting, jumping, etc.
Spaceship.desc: Lutro 的另一個 2D 平台遊戲展示示例，這次展示了銀河惡魔城風格的遊戲如何作為 Lutro 遊戲運行。它有幾個已實現的屏幕和一些遊戲機制，包括戰鬥、物品收集、跳躍等。

Tetris.name: Tetris
Tetris.original_desc: A version of Tetris for Lutro.
Tetris.desc: Lutro 的俄羅斯方塊版本。
